item.title: [B]Multicanales CHIVAS69[/B] Telemundo - Univision - EspnDeportes - FoxDeportes - Unimas - Deportes

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Canal ', ['telemundo', 'univision', 'unimas', 'Deportes', 'EspnDeportes', 'FoxDeportes', 'Deportes2']) lists = ['http://whostreams.net/embed/6otcp42qvvs', 'http://whostreams.net/embed/yjz92igvajl5l9', 'http://whostreams.net/embed/le2di', 'http://whostreams.net/embed/k35qrdo5h', 'http://whostreams.net/embed/2gzsuk67y', 'http://whostreams.net/embed/vume8720', 'http://whostreams.net/embed/8vzxl3yuc'] return lists[ret]

item.title: [B]Canales Sudamerica ESPN | FOXSPORTS | DIRECTV SPORTS | F1 [/B] Baja Resolucion

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <title>[makelist.param1] [makelist.param4]</title> <link>http://$doregex[ip]$doregex[m3u8]</link> <regex> <name>ip</name> <expres>redirect=(.*)</expres> <page>http://[makelist.param3]:1935/loadbalancer</page> <referer>www.http://[makelist.param4]</referer> </regex> <regex> <name>m3u8</name> <expres>ea \+ "([^"]+)</expres> <page>http://[makelist.param4]/membedplayer/[makelist.param2]/1/500/400</page> <agent>Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5</agent> <referer>http://www.[makelist.param4]</referer> </regex> <thumbnail>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/master/img/deportes.png</thumbnail>

iem.title: [B]Multicanales MaxDeportes LigaSantander | LigaMX | LigaColombia | Ligas Sudamerica [/B] [mips]

regex.name: m3u8
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5

regex.name: hls
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Canal ', ['max2a3', 'max3a3', 'max7a3', 'max10a2', 'max13a1', 'max16a2', 'max18a5', 'max20a1', 'max31a3', 'max32a2', 'max34a4', 'max36a1']) lists = ['max2a3', 'max3a3', 'max7a3', 'max10a2', 'max13a1', 'max16a2', 'max18a5', 'max20a1', 'max31a3', 'max32a2', 'max34a4', 'max36a1'] return lists[ret]

makelist #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 from urlresolver.plugins.lib import jsunpack source=requests.get(re.findall('src="(.*?kastream[^"]+)',page_data)[0],headers={'Referer':'http://cdn.zonasports.es/c-5x.php'}).text return 'http://'+re.findall('Clappr.Player[\w\W]*?source.+?//([^\'"]+)',jsunpack.unpack(re.findall('id="Player"(?s)(.*?)</script',source)[0]).replace('\\',''))[0]+'|User-Agent=iPad'

[B]Multicanal WIZHD 10[I] [/I][/B] $doregex[url]
url #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re,requests headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': 'http://schedule.racing/sevenembed.php?id=wiz10&p=0&c=0&stretching=uniform'} url = '$doregex[url2]' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers).text data1 = re.findall('return\(\[([^\]]+)', source)[0] data2 = re.findall('\+ ([^\.]+).join', source)[0] data2 = re.findall(data2 + ' = \W(.+)\]', source)[0] data1 = ''.join(data1).replace('"','').replace(',', '').replace(' ', '').replace('\/','/') data2 = ''.join(data2).replace('"','').replace(',', '').replace(' ', '').replace('\/','/') data3 = re.findall('getElementById\W"([^"]+)', source)[0] data3 = re.findall(data3 + '\W*(.+?=*)\W', source)[0] return data1 + data2 + data3
url2 src="([^"]+) http://schedule.racing/sevenembed.php?id=wiz10&p=0&c=0&stretching=uniform http://wizhdsports.is/live/stream10.html

buscar #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Busca evento:', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d

<title>[COLOR gold][makelist.param2][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link> <thumbnail>https://[makelist.param3]</thumbnail>
#$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): count=re.findall('data-page="\d">(\d).*\n.*?raquo',page_data)[0];pn=1;data=[] while pn <= int(count): page='https://www.myfree-tivi.com/livetv?page='+str(pn);source=requests.get(page).content;list=re.findall('<main.*?>(?s)(.*?)<nav',source)[0].replace(''','\'') data +=re.findall('href="/(.*?)".title="(?!Chaine)(.*?)".*\n.*src="//([^"]+)',list);pn +=1 return data

#$pyFunction import json, base64,re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): jsdata=json.loads(page_data) s=[] for o in jsdata["LIVETV"]: s.append((o["cid"],o["category_name"],o["category_image"])) return s
